i want to burn it on dvd but theres my dvds only hold 4.4g, the box says 4.7 but nero says there not enough room. anybody know how to burn on dvd would be much appreciated. thanks in advance

to burn a file over 4.4 GB you need Dual Layer disks (and a disk drive that can burn them) otherwise you just have to install it on your computer and hope you dont need to reformat and lose the files...

and for everyone needing the program to open/burn ISO's i think the best, and easiest to use, one is powerISO (google it, or download it via torrents) and for those who dont want to burn to a DVD, you do not have to mount the ISO, just open it with powerISO and extract it to a folder, then install it from there, works just the same

lolboy, a DVD having 4.4GB is uncommon, but it happens, it could be faulty, have a space between layers, just a bad manufacturer, etc. Just go get new DVDs and try again, if it still doesnt work it's either nero, or something with your disk drive
lolboy, I've got some TDK discs that only burn to 4.4 gigs (to my great dissatisfaction and irritation...)...  A WHOLE damn stack of them...  So I dunno, just thought I'd give you some sympathy :)

For all the "newbs" out there, here's some instructions:

1. Unrar any one of the rar files ( rld-ee3.r40 for example)

2. Mount with Daemon Tools (Right Click Daemon Tools Icon in tray, select Virtual CD\DVD-ROM, select one of the devices, and navigate to your unrared file, and select).  Alternatively, you could use other software such as PowerISO, MagicISO, etc.

3.Install.  When you need a serial enter one of these or go to My Computer, and RIGHT CLICK on 
your virtual drive and select Explore or Open, then go to the Crack Folder and locate serial generator.

     DEF3-XAM7-PYB4-CET8-7772
     DYL2-LAS8-MUB6-SEG8-5698
     RUF4-NET3-NYN3-PAR5-2989
     RAN5-RUW3-CAN9-GAN6-2934
     DYL6-NAJ5-DUB6-SYR8-6594

4. Copy the executable (.exe) file to your install directory and replace the old one with the cracked version

5.Play

Park0ur4life!

Its easy! 
But to "unrar" you need some kind of rar utility like Winrar.

1. Unrar.
  2. Burn or mount with Daemon tools.
  3. When asked for a serial enter one of the following serials or use the
     keygen located in the /Crack directory on the DVD:

     DEF3-XAM7-PYB4-CET8-7772
     DYL2-LAS8-MUB6-SEG8-5698
     RUF4-NET3-NYN3-PAR5-2989
     RAN5-RUW3-CAN9-GAN6-2934
     DYL6-NAJ5-DUB6-SYR8-6594

  4. Copy the cracked executable from the /Crack directory on the DVD to your
     installation directory.
  5. Play the game

RAN5-RUW3-CAN9-GAN6-2934

installation directory.
